role.name: approver-standard-legacy
role.description: "Legacy" variant of a standard approver role

authorization.name: own-workitems-delegate
authorization.description: Allow delegation of own work items.

authorization.name: own-workitems-read-and-complete
authorization.description: Allows reading and completion of own work items. This was implicitly allowed before 4.8; now it must be specified explicitly.

authorization.name: cases-read
authorization.description: Allow to see the requester of the operation that is being approved and the current delta. In order for the approver to see other properties (e.g. history of the approvals) please allow read access to other items as well.
